name: wp_boilerplate-project
description: Based on Fabrica Dev Kit for Wordpress Project
author: werk85 <moin@werk85.de> (http://www.werk85.de/)

scripts.logs: docker-compose logs -f --tail='46' wp | sed -e "s/ WARNING: .* into stderr: \"\(NOTICE: PHP message: \)\{0,1\}\(\[[a-zA-Z0-9 :\-]\{1,\}\]\)\{0,1\} \{0,1\}\(.*\)\"/ ⚠️  $(tput setaf 3)\3$(tput sgr0)/"

scripts_info.run: Run 'gulp'. Default task will watch and process source files.
scripts_info.shroot: Start shell as root on WP container.
scripts_info.wp: Run WP Cli. eg. 'wp_boilerplate wp option list' or 'wp_boilerplate wp -- --info'
scripts_info.remove: Stop all project containers, remove their volumes and WP project image.
scripts_info.wordmove:pull: Pull uploads, plugins and database from remote staging server
scripts_info.wordmove:push: Push theme to remote staging server
scripts_info.compose: Update docker-compose.yml with current user's id and group
scripts_info.init: Initialize project after cloning of repository
scripts_info.dbbackup: dump local db to dbDump folder
scripts_info.dbimport:latest: import latest db dump from dbDump folder
scripts_info.dbimport:default: import default db dump from dbDump folder (initialDump.sql)
